fastest_path: integrate (flag server) + minimal UI in our admin
thin_slice: gate 1 admin feature per-tenant + admin UI to flip the flag.
1 webhook trigger → 1 action (e.g., create internal task) + run log.

fastest_path: build (on our event system) with simple UI.
thin_slice: log key admin actions (order actions, settings changes) with actor + timestamp.
roles + permissions for 3–5 critical resources.
return initiation UI + reason capture + admin review queue.

feature: Unified order timeline (“single pane of glass”)
thin_slice: single order view with status timeline + key actions.

feature: Admin usage analytics (what merchants actually use)
thin_slice: capture 10 key admin events + render 1 dashboard.

fastest_path: integrate search engine + build merch UI.
thin_slice: search service + basic query UI + synonyms table.
(see features-ranked)
1 content type + read-only embed in admin.

fastest_path: build embedable “order context panel” + action APIs.
thin_slice: show order context inside ticket view + 1 safe action.
show subscription status + allow pause/skip (read + 1 write action).

feature: Shipping ops: batch labels + rules engine + exception queues
thin_slice: order import view + bulk “create label” + tracking update.

fastest_path: build workflow UI + integrate later as needed
thin_slice: moderation queue (approve/reject) + publish states.

fastest_path: integrate providers first; keep orchestration minimal early
thin_slice: build segments + send a single campaign (via provider) + basic reporting.

fastest_path: build thin “destinations” layer (start with 2–3) + keep scope small
thin_slice: event sink + 1 destination + basic failure logs.
embed 1 dashboard + enforce tenant scoping.

fastest_path: build the primitive (can power content, promos, configs)
thin_slice: draft + publish state machine for one object type.
create experiment + assign variants + report a single metric.
rules-based recommendations for 1–2 placements.

feature: Integration setup wizard + run logs + retries (generic “connectors” primitive)
fastest_path: build the primitive UI + keep connectors small
thin_slice: connector setup wizard + run history table for 1 integration.
